DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the analgesic effects of dexketoprofen trometamol, tramadol hydrochloride, pethidine hydrochloride and their combinations in laparoscopic Nissen fundoplication.
DOC.brief_title: Intraoperative Use of Dexketoprofen Trometamol, Pethidine Hcl, Tramadol Hcl and Their Combinations for Postoperative Pain Management in Laparoscopic Nissen Fundoplication
DOC.criteria: 1860 years old ASA III patients Clinical diagnosis of gastroesophageal reflux patients Allergic reactions to NSAIDs or opioid analgesics Body mass index exceeding 35 Pregnancy
